A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Made up force powers. Hologram projection\, mind link\, outer space flight.  Crapped on Skywalker legacy. No character development. Snoke can't sense lightsaber moving RIGHT NEXT to him.  Poe is an idiot. Finn and Rose beyond ridiculous. Slow speed chase boring.  Nothing made sense. Hopefully Chewie was having a nightmare and dreamt this crap and we'll get the real episode VIII next time. SMH.
